description:
Picture yourself on a crisp fall morning, the leaves rustling beneath your tires as you embark on a cool-weather adventure. Now, imagine staying comfortably warm while enjoying superb breathability, this is where this jersey shines. With its brushed finish, it offers the cozy insulation you need without sacrificing airflow. It's your ideal companion for those invigorating rides when the temperature dips.

  • Interior brushed finish provides extra warmth without sacrificing breathability
  • Crafted in Italy using high-quality Italian fabrics
  • Anti-slip silicone waistband keeps the jersey securely in place
  • Equipped with three back pockets and a secured zip pocket for convenient storage
  • Top-quality, self-locking YKK zipper for ease of use
  • Reflective details enhance visibility for added safety during low-light conditions
  • Regular fit for comfort
name: Peppermint Signature Thermal Jersey - Women's
